__e: How could a boy have made someone so mad ?
God, for what sin am I being punished ...now it's about to be evening...
What I don't know is what you've done to warrant it.
You can be so harsh, and I don't know where it comes from, or what I've done.
I can't just try again with you after everything because you haven't done anything to earn that.
I... I can't just try again with you after everything because you haven't done anything to earn that.
I don't know what Maria did to get a friend like you. [chuckling]
So tell me, what do you do to deserve a second chance like that?
I mean, I almost feel like I don't know what I did to deserve such an amazing person.
He hasn't done anything to the money, which is Dan's point exactly.
Darling, I want you to understand there is great joy that comes from earning money from a job well done.
He didn't do anything to deserve the fate you gave him.
Tell me what you've done to earn yours.
A daughter is not supposed to have to earn her mother's help or her love.
But you tell me what she ever could have done to deserve death at the hand of somebody like you.
Is it true that you said that you do not believe that you even deserve a heart because your life is unremarkable in every way?
He must have been a very good boy to deserve such a happy day.
I don't know what I did to deserve such a good man.
